meanings.sent1: I like to snack on raisins during my break.
meanings.sent2: My oatmeal tastes better with a handful of raisins.
meanings.sent3: The raisins in the cookie made it extra chewy.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like raisins in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The raisins in the trail mix added a burst of sweetness.

meanings.sent1: Raisins are a popular ingredient in many desserts.
meanings.sent2: I always pack some raisins in my lunch for a quick energy boost.
meanings.sent3: The ants were having a party around the spilled raisins.
meanings.sent4: The raisins in the cinnamon rolls melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The raisins in the bread pudding were plump and juicy.
